lines.text: El Cuélebere: Mwahaha I am the mighty villain of this game.
El Cuélebere: Although nothing what I say now is representetive of how I will be...
El Cuélebere: But have a good look at me! Once the developers finish making my home I will be very scary just wait and see!
El Cuélebere: You can even read all about in our dialogue documents... you know about the documents right?
